version_description:
- Added support for statements
- Added app version information in profile tab
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Conveniently activate your Point Card and set your PIN inside Point App.
- Easily access your account and routing numbers from your Preferences.
- UI improvements.
- Bug fixes.
• Bug Fixes and Improvements
• General bug fixes, optimizations, and design improvements.
• General bug fixes, optimizations, and design improvements.

• Instant funding via debit card and Apple Pay will be rolled out to users over time.
• Users can now login via email rather than via phone number.
• Welcome screen information is hidden until Face ID unlocks the user’s device.
• Miscellaneous bug fixes.

• Instantly add funds to your account using a card from an existing bank account, including via Apple Pay.
• In addition to signing in with your phone number, you can now optionally sign in with your email address.
• UI enhancements and bug fixes.
- General bug fixes, optimizations, and design improvements.
